item.description:
Independence Gaming! Come and join us on July 4th at Matts place for games and BBQ throuout the day. We will retire back to my place around sunset for Fireworks (the concord ones are across the street and this is the best place to see them). Bring some meat, beer, and more fireworks if you want. All are welcome.

Please RSVP, head count will dictate the games played.
item.name: Independence Gaming!
